CustomField.formula:
IF( $Organization.Id == '00D1t000000q8Z4',
CASE (ELLISPHERE__Elli_Risk__c, 'A',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/risque_faible_nul.png','Risque faible à quasi-nul',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/EN/risque_faible_nul_A.png','Low to non existant risk',16,161)), 'B',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/risque_moyen_faible.png','Risque moyen à faible',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/EN/risque_moyen_faible_A.png','Average to low risk',16,161)), 'C',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/risque_moyen_eleve.png','risque moyen à élevé',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/EN/risque_moyen_eleve_A.png','Average to high risk',16,161)), 'D',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/risque_tres_eleve.png','risque très avéré',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/risque_tres_eleve_A.png','High risk level',16,161)), 'E',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/risque_avere.png','Risque avéré',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/Ellisphere/Ellisphere/EN/risque_avere_A.png','Proven risk',16,161)), "n/a")
,
CASE (ELLISPHERE__Elli_Risk__c, 'A',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/risque_faible_nul.png','Risque faible à quasi nul',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/EN/risque_faible_nul_A.png','Low to non existant risk',16,161)), 'B',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/risque_moyen_faible.png','Risque moyen à faible',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/EN/risque_moyen_faible_A.png','Average to low risk',16,161)), 'C',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/risque_moyen_eleve.png','risque moyen à élevé',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/EN/risque_moyen_eleve_A.png','Average to high risk',16,161)), 'D',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/risque_tres_eleve.png','risque très avéré',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/risque_tres_eleve_A.png','High risk level',16,161)), 'E',IF( $Label.ellisphere__elli_currentlanguage == 'fr',IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/risque_avere.png','Risque avéré',16,161), IMAGE('/resource/ELLISPHERE__ImagesEllisphere/Ellisphere_images/EN/risque_avere_A.png','Proven risk',16,161)), "n/a")
)
CustomField.label: Classe de Risque
